job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pModis is currently looking for a Data Scientist for a exciting opportunity in Michigan remote to start This will be working in a fast paced enterprise environment working with large data sets and doing heavy modeling The ideal candidate would have of 3 years of data science spanexperience have worked with customer insight analytics and has worked on new model development utilizing Python and R  span ppbrppstrongPOSITION DESCRIPTIONstrongnbsppulliBuild largescale machinelearning modelspipelinesliliMaintain and enhance operational models through their lifecycle liliDeveloping metrics and reports to monitor model accuracy and evaluate performancelilispanTranslate complex quantitative analysis into business insightsspanliliCollect data perform statistical analysis and present solutions to Product Ownersbusiness customers liliWorks hands on with tools such as Python R and SQLliliDefine and create the next generation of data solutionsliulpbrppstrongTECHNICAL SKILLS DESIREDstrongpulli3  5 years of Data Science experiencenbspliliPredictive ModellingliliStatistical analysisliliPythonliliRliliSQLliliBachelors degree in mathematics data science statistics or computer scienceliliExperience with GCP is a plusliulpbrppstrongADDITIONAL INFORMATIONstrongpulliExcellent compensation packages including Subsidized Medical Benefits Paid Time Off and 401kliliNo ThirdParty inquiriesliliThis role can be remote to start  but will eventually need to be onsite in Michiganliul
